prompts: Create a fiery Pokemon with a sleek body and vibrant orange flames on its back.
I want a bipedal Pokemon that has a cool blue-green head and a fiery tail.
Generate a Pokemon design that features orange and cream colors with a unique flame pattern.
Make a Pokemon that stands proudly with a bold stance and fiery accents.
Imagine a medium-sized Pokemon that uses fire-based attacks and has a passionate personality.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and mountains, showcasing its fiery nature.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a small creature and has a striking visual presence.
